title: monster alphabet
content:
Usually a stuffed menagerie of animal letters makes me think of kids rooms – let’s write their name or add their initials, right? 
 

 
Somehow, I think the Monster Alphabet creatures would be better suited to something a little loftier. Perhaps it’s the extremely unique handmade approach to each individual letter. Or maybe it’s the price, which makes collecting a set of letters a little difficult. These letters have so much personality that they’re more like a piece of art to add to your favorite wall. You can even request your own custom version of your initial. I don’t know what I’d do for my initial, do you? 
 
   
 
The post monster alphabet appeared first on Small for Big .
